text:
When trying to override or add request headers in the HTTP Header manager or 
add parameters in the HTTP request sampler at the HTTP POST mode, the actual 
request doesn't show as if those headers and parameteres were changed.
creator: ofer@feathersys.com

text:
this bug was fixed by sebastian on december 4th. I tested it with my Echo 
servlet using Post and it worked fine.
creator: woolfel@yahoo.com
